name: Flappy Bird (itch) (Momoyon)
description:
Flappy Bird made using my own Game Engine.

Only made this to test the engine and to see if there are any features missing.

The background is scrolled using a fragment shader but that is totally unnecessary and could be scrolled without one, but i wanted to use a shader anyway. The bgm maybe a bit annoying, sorry about that. maybe i'll add a mute button later.

Also the pipe spawning is totally random and can sometimes maybe impossible to go through.

Version 1.1.0:

  • Pressing M mutes the bgm
  • Customizable config file
